İlk olarak oyunun grafikleri mükemmel hatta çok ciddiyim 2022 yılında, günümüzde bile çıksa kimse şikayet edemez Unreal Engine 3'ü sömüren bir oyun ha bu grafiklerle bu oyun optimize değildir falan diye düşünmeyin GTX1650 ile 1920x1080 Ultra, AntiAliasing Açık, DirectX 10 ayarlarında 130-90FPS civarlarında oynadım ve türk gençliğinin Medarı İftirahı GTX1050 Tİ ile bile 2K Yüksek ayarlarda çatır çatır oynarsınız. Silahlı çatışmalarda çok az bir hamlık var ama çok değil heleki eski oyunlarda olan hamlığın yanından bile geçmez yani güzel, vuruş hissi açısından gönlünüz rahat olsun hangi düşmanın ne tarafına vurursanız iliklerinize kadar hisediyorsunuz oynanış da ki çeşitlilik kesinlikle hayli hayli yeterli. hatırlarsam 8 tane özel gücümüz vardı yeri geldiğinde elizabeth bize sağdan soldan bulduğu Can, Mermi, Güç konusunda yardımcı oluyor ben oyunu Normal Zorlukta oynadım ve sadece 5-6 defa öldüm ama çok kez ölüm ile burun buruna kaldım. Oyun nasıl oluyorsa merminizi hep ucu ucuna bırakmayı başarıyor yani Resident Evil'da ki o gerginliğe benziyor ama hiç mermisiz kalmıyorsunuz. Fakat bir tane negatif yorumum var bütün yetenekler o kadar efektif değil ben sadece Atlı olan ve Charge adındaki yetenekleri kullandım ve bir noktada hafif bir sıkılma verdi ve verdiği gibi oyun bitti yani daha uzun bir oyun olsaydı kesinlikle sıkılırdım ama oyun bunu tam zamanında bitiriyor. Oyunun Türkçe dil desteği yok ama yaması çok başarılı tavsiye ederim. Hikaye açısından da şaheser denebilecek bir oyun "bence", ilk oyunları oynamadan bu oyuna girerseniz pek bişey kaybetmezsiniz ama ana Loru anlayabilmek için ilk oyunları oynamak şart. SPOİLER OLMAYACAK MERAK ETMEYİN oyun dünyasının en büyük Pilot Twistlerinden birine sahip bir hikaye sadece bu kadar diyorum indirimlerde ben 10+TL'ye Satın aldım ve iki günde 9 saatte bitirdim ve SONUNA KADAR HAK EDİYOR. Mükemmel Bir deneyimdi oynamadıysanız ve geç kalırsanız pişman olacağınızı dile getirmek isterim iyi oyunlar.
:D
Sem sombra de dúvidas esse foi o jogo mais envolvente e emocionante que eu já joguei, a história, a gameplay, tudo nesse jogo é perfeito, fora a questão dos upgrades de acordo com o decorrer do game
fantastic game and story

Pyszny rosół można ugotować tylko z kurczaka już bez wołowiny i podrobów. Wystarczy dodać trochę mniej wody.
Pozostały rosół należy przecedzić, zagotować i zamknąć w słoikach. Po ostudzeniu wstawić do lodówki. Mięso i warzywa z rosołu przechowujemy oddzielnie.
Następnego dnia z reszty rosołu można przygotować ZUPĘ POMIDOROWĄ.
Ugotowane mięso z rosołu można wykorzystać do: farszu na KROKIETY, PIEROGI Z MIĘSEM, PASZTECIKI.

Скучно, тупость какая то, в начале игры главный герой плывет на лодке еще с двумя муд*ками, которые высаживают его возле маяка, который отличается от маяка из прошлых частей. Никто ничего не объясняет, зачем мы туда приплыли, для чего? А на*уя оно нам надо, действительно. Потом мы попадаем в рай или небесный город, где из за того, что главный герой хотел кинуть мячом в ведущего, его хотят увести правоохранительные органы, и он просто начинает мочить их, что это ЗА БРЕД???!!! Это тупость какая то, потому что после этого нужно бегать и мочить врагов, все... Тупое говнище! Я помню как проходил биошок 2007 года, там в начале игры все было понятно, сюжет интригующий и захватывающий, тем более для того времени, а тут что? х*ета

Incluso rejugandolo hoy en en día en el 2022, me parece un JUEGAZO. Aunque una pena que decidieran hacerlo con mas acción y menos exploración (A diferencia de los dos anteriores), el mundo, la historia y la sensación de disparo son muchísimo mejores Si te gustan los shooters en primera persona y un mundo distinto de lo habitual te lo recomiendo, no es muy largo y es un buen desafío también si lo juegas en difícil. Al terminarlo desearas que hagan el cuarto Bioshock con la tecnología de ahora!
现在才打通，优点是早就听说的美术风格、伊丽傻白和超强剧情，对本作毫无概念的我最震撼的还是坐火箭上天见到天空城的哈利路亚和最后被溺死的场景。海葬则是串联了无限和初代，伊丽傻白，我的傻白。

1.剧情好
2.优化好（像我这么渣的电脑开高画质完全没问题）
3.最后的结局真的很神，真心推荐你们玩玩
Arguably ( and in my personal opinion) the best story a game has ever had, it had me hooked from start to finish, nailed the ending, whats not to love
很好玩剧情要看解说才懂
Buenisimokasdmniasdoia

Por ter jogado os jogos da franquia em sequencia posso falar com segurança que o primeiro e o segundo jogo são melhores, por enquanto minha única reclamação é que a jogabilidade é m pouco diferente dos outros jogos da franquia e por isso está me dando alguns problemas. Para ser sincero acredito que se esse fosse um jogo sozinho sem seus dois predecessores o critério de avaliação não seria tão alto porém com a fama que BioShock 1 e 2 tem fica difícil botar ele no mesmo patamar.
This one is the best of the saga, just amazing.
游戏可以给9分，有6分给游戏的剧情和战斗，2分给与前两作不同的无限城。与极乐城的阴暗比，它带有一种朦胧的宗教美感，具有童话色彩的滤镜，让我玩起来的观感比前两作舒服太多了！最后重要的一分给伊丽莎白!!!少一分是因为剧情有些时间上的悖论，和前两作的地方有些冲突。当然小小的缺点也盖不过它作为艺术品的光芒，而整个系列也带给我一个很完整的故事，特别不错！

After playing it for second time (previously on PS3 back then) the story still caught me off guard, the characters are great with me so easily being attached to both of them, the voice actors/actress are phenomenal, it's rare for me getting excited to find sound recorder collectables just to listen to the characters talking because i was so intrigued with their story telling.
Columbia city is beautiful and even after 8 years the graphic still holds up really nice and some of scenes are breathtaking and made me literally glazing upon the views/scenery for few minutes to enjoy them.

Btw this is maybe controversial for some people but i will say it:
Bioshock Infinite is my favorite between the trilogy and you can't change my mind..
It holds special place in my heart.
10/10

This game is a masterpiece and also the best of the series, but this isn't even just a game, this art and an experience.

The story felt so much better than the first 2 games, even though, those were really good as well. The twists at the and gave me goosebumps, because they're so shocking and amazingly written.

The characters are all written very well. 
Elizabeth especially, she is the real main character in the story. She really has feelings, not just in cutscenes, but trough the whole game you can see and hear her doing something. If you're out of combat she will comment on things, do thing according to the environment, etc., if you're in combat she will seek cover for herself and also get you ammo, health, and salt (basically mana). Her character is so sympathetic, kind, and good hearted, that she is easily one of the best female characters of all time.
Booker is a bit grumpy at start, but he is a very good main character, and eventually you can meet his real side and that is where will get even better.  
The Lutece twins are a very good duo, who have some time oddly hilarious moments, but they help you to get some answers along the way as well, and i really like them throug out the game.

The game also looks beautiful, I didn't even realise it was almost 9 years old.

Игры серии "BioShock" стоят в моем рейтинге любимых игр на третьем месте. Каждая часть невероятна, но любовь началась именно с Infinite. Почему-то я часто начинаю игры не с первых частей, довольно странно, но как есть. Элизабет входит в рейтинг любимых персонажей ever. Перепрошла заново вместе с длс, потрясающе.
esta bueno

How do you improve upon the world of Rapture with its remarkable storytelling and unforgettable characters? You create a whole new universe of infinite possibilities brought to life only by the magic of video games. Having underwent development hell before its release, BioShock Infinite ultimately succeeds in delivering what it set out to be as a fresh new installment that's enjoyable with an ambitious narrative that is contemplated upon long after its conclusion.

BioShock Infinite focuses on the relationship between the main protagonists, Jack and Elizabeth, as well as the political war between the Vox and the government. Although the story is extremely complex at times, its ethical and moral implications are rewarding if dug a little deeper. Personally, I found the opening of BioShock Infinite on par with the original BioShock. Exploring Columbia felt authentic and gave me a weird nostalgic feeling that was constantly felt throughout the whole journey. In terms of gameplay, the new Sky-Hook mechanic is awesome plus the gunplay is faster and more satisfying. Vigors were cool but didn't feel the need to use them as much as with Plasmids from BS1/BS2. Additionally, I found the AI weaker on Normal difficulty, and the Soldiers not as cool as the Splicers. However, the Handymen, Patriots, Firemen and the Boys of Silence were all quite memorable.

BioShock Infinite is more than just a game, it's a representation of what video games can accomplish in terms of storytelling. The beauty of Columbia is not only skin deep but also best described as a living breathing world filled with emotions, captivating stories, intertwined by thought provoking subplots, mixed in with philosophy and quantum physics. And just when you think it can't get any better, Burial at Sea Episode 1 & 2 elevate the experience even further. It wraps up the story perfectly and leaves me with a strong recommendation of the entire BioShock series.
